name: 蔡麗珠
objective: 基礎生物化學，是從認識動、植物和細菌細胞到脂質、蛋白質和DNA和醣類構造及其功能關係。
schedule:
Ch.1 The Foundations of Biochemistry
Ch.3 Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins
Ch.4 The 3-D structure of Proteins
Ch.5 Protein Function
Ch.6 Enzymes
Ch.7 Carbohydrates and Glycobiology
Ch.8 Nucleotides and Nucleic acids
Ch.9 DNA-base Information Technologies
Ch.10 Lipids
scorePolicy:
平時成績　　10%
期中考1 　　30%
期中考2 　　30%
期末考 　　30%
